pages.text: Goniatites is a small ammonite which looked quite similar to more well known mesozoic ammonites. It had a wavy shell patterning like some other ammonites. Gonitites lived mainly in shallow oceans rather than open oceans, though some were found in open ocean sediments.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Egg
